alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:37PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 430 PM MST... At 337 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles southeast of Freeman, or 26 miles west of Casa Grande, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Estrella, Freeman, Big Horn, Sonoran National Monument, Kaka, Ak-Chin Village, and Mobile. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 124 and 159. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 6 and 30, and between mile markers 42 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; West Pinal County
